subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees will not say it yet, but their lead in the American League wild-card race allows them to peek ahead to October. If they get there, they will heavily on their top two starters, Chien-Ming Wang and Andy Pettitte.
snippet: The Yankees will not say it yet, but their lead in the American League wild-card race allows them to peek ahead to October. If they get there, they will heavily on their top two starters, Chien-Ming Wang and Andy Pettitte.
